plot outline: A film about Realization and Acceptance. Kumar, a bachelor in his thirties leaves his corporate job in Kochi to become a graphic novelist. He embarks on a new life as an Uber driver in Kochi while working on his graphic novel titled 'Pixelia'. One day a transgender named Mandakini gets into his cab and that day changes Kumar's life forever. Gradually a bonding ensues between Kumar and Mandakini making Kumar realize and come to terms with his queer identity. As they start their new relationship, Kumar gets into deeper conflicts regarding adopting a child, as adoption by queer parents is realistically difficult in a country like India.
